mapper.select: select pbt.prd_board_id, pbt.discount_rate, pbt.price, pbt.title, pbt.content, pbt.star, pbt.category, pbt.brand, pt.PRD_ID, pt.prd_nm, pt.prd_price, pt.amount, pt.option1, pt.option2, pt.prd_UPLOAD_PATH from prd_board_t pbt LEFT JOIN FILE_T ft on(pbt.PRD_BOARD_ID =ft.ARTICLE_ID) LEFT JOIN (SELECT pt.PRD_ID, pt.prd_nm, pt.prd_price, pt.amount, pt.prd_board_id ,pt.option1, pt.option2, ft.UPLOAD_PATH AS prd_upload_path FROM prd_t pt LEFT JOIN FILE_T ft on(pt.PRD_ID =ft.ARTICLE_ID AND ft.board_flag = 'prd')) pt on(pbt.PRD_BOARD_ID=pt.PRD_BOARD_ID) WHERE pbt.prd_board_id=#{prd_board_id} and ft.board_flag='prd_board' order by prd_board_id
select count(*) from prd_board_t where title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
